# duration

**Instance Property**

The number of seconds, following an entry’s date, that WidgetKit considers the widget for rotation to the top of the stack.

## Declaration

```swift
var duration: TimeInterval
```

## Configuring Relevance Properties

- **score**: A value that indicates the relevance of an entry compared to other entries in the current and past timelines.

items.description: A value that indicates the relevance of an entry compared to other entries in the current and past timelines.
items.name: score
